subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Bryzgalov made 23 saves for his 17th career N.H.L. shutout, and Martin Hanzal and Lee Stempniak each scored twice to help the Phoenix Coyotes beat the visiting Edmonton Oilers, 5-0.
snippet: Ilya Bryzgalov made 23 saves for his 17th career N.H.L. shutout, and Martin Hanzal and Lee Stempniak each scored twice to help the Phoenix Coyotes beat the visiting Edmonton Oilers, 5-0.
